title: Ai Weiwei Sunflowers--ref to Chinese ceramics

content.question: The medium Ai Weiwei used in Kui Hua Zi (Sunflower Seeds) comments on an artistic tradition exemplified by which of the following works of art?

topic.text: 10.2: Purpose and Audience in Global Contemporary Art

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Explain how a specific work of art (or group of related works of art) demonstrates continuity and/or change within an artistic tradition, style, or practice.
